definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Thus man restrains himself from the evil doings and does good things.
sentences.chinese: 人于是就收敛起自己恶的一面，于是就积善行德。

sentences.english: Doing good deed can be explained as deed that benefit people and bad deed is deed that hurt or harm people.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你做的是善的却没有善念，这也是善行。

sentences.english: Think about all the good you do each day, and the ways that you enrich others.
sentences.chinese: 想下你每天做的善行和你施恩于别人的方式。

sentences.english: let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 他就当在智慧的温柔上，显出他的善行来。
这种状况并不因你的善行而有所改变。

sentences.english: If it is profit-driven, some people believe this kind of benevolence is tainted.
sentences.chinese: 如果它被利益驱动，人们就会认为这种善行被玷污了。

sentences.english: Born of the true Dhamma, endowed with such virtues as good practice.
sentences.chinese: 由真法而生，有这般善行修持的功德。

sentences.english: Comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.
sentences.chinese: 安慰你们的心，并且在一切善行善言上，坚固你们。

sentences.english: But as it becometh women professing godliness, with good works.
sentences.chinese: 而要以善行装饰自己，这才合乎称为虔敬天主的女人。

sentences.english: But the role of the principle of beneficence is not always so unambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 但是善行原则所起的作用也不总是很分明的。
为什么吖？权力并不会带来善行。

sentences.english: Any action that takes us Godward is a good action.
sentences.chinese: 任何使我们趋近于神的行为都是善行。

sentences.english: He won the nickname "Bulldozer" for good reason.
sentences.chinese: 他亦因种种善行得到了“推土机”的美名。

sentences.english: Forgiveness is woodland of peace, where perfect calm prevails and austerities are performed.
sentences.chinese: 宽恕是和平的绿地，在这里有理想中的平静和善行。

sentences.english: Good deeds are rewarded by happiness.
Everyone expressed their benedictions to Mr. Jason's benevolence and benignity .
sentences.chinese: 每个人对贾森先生的善行和慈爱表达了他们的祝福。

definition: to do good works/to be merciful
Renai or Jenai district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to accumulate merit/to do good/to give to charity/virtuous actions
